features: Kit Includes: PowerMop Spray Mop, 2 Mop Pad Refills, 1 Floor Cleaning solution with Fresh Scent, and 2 batteries
Mop smarter with Swiffer PowerMop and clean in half the time vs. mop and bucket - includes cleaning and drying time
5X cleaning power with hundreds of scrubbing strips ABSORB plus LOCK to clean your toughest messes and get them off your floors*Pad layers vs. Swiffer WetJet pads
Large swivel head reaches under furniture and locks to make cleaning baseboards easy
Reinvigorate your home and enjoy the fresh scent for hours. Leaves behind up to 2 hours of freshness after initial product use
Pre-mixed solution breaks down tough, sticky messes and dries fast - no need to rinse.
PowerMop is safe on all finished floors. Do NOT use on unfinished, oiled or waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles or carpeted floors because they may be water sensitive
Buy Swiffer worry-free. If you're not completely satisfied, check out our money-back guarantee
body.description: Mop smarter with the Swiffer PowerMop, an all-in-one mopping system that gives you a mop and bucket clean in half the time*. The multi-surface mopping pads have 300+ scrubbing strips that reach deep into grooves and grout to remove sticky spills and daily dirt and grime. The fresh scent of PowerMop solution will fill your home with freshness for hours**. Some assembly required; batteries included.*vs. mop and bucket - includes cleaning and drying time**Leaves behind up to 2 hours of freshness after initial product use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Honest User's Experience
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the Swiffer PowerMop Multi-Surface Mop Kit for the past month, and while it has its strengths, it falls short in some areas. The kit, which includes the PowerMop, 2 Mopping Pad Refills, 1 Floor Cleaning Solution with Fresh Scent, and 2 batteries, promises efficient and quick cleaning, and for the most part, it delivers. The 5X cleaning power with hundreds of scrubbing strips is a standout feature, effectively tackling tough messes.On the positive side, the large swivel head reaches under furniture, making baseboard cleaning a breeze. The pre-mixed solution breaks down sticky messes and dries fast, leaving behind a pleasant, fresh scent. However, the satisfaction is not uniform among users. Some applaud the ease of assembly, finding it user-friendly and effective. The solution is praised for its delightful scent and the way it leaves floors shining.On the flip side, stability seems to be a common concern. Some users report issues with the liquid bottle and mopping heads staying securely in place during use, while others express disappointment in the handle's attachment reliability. The mixed opinions on fit and quality contribute to a lack of unanimous acclaim.In conclusion, the Swiffer PowerMop has its merits, particularly in its cleaning power and convenience. However, the reported issues with stability and attachment could be potential drawbacks for some users. While I appreciate the efficiency in cleaning, the product's overall value appears to be divisive among customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent mop for my small apartment
reviews.reviewText: Work's great. I love it. No more mop and wringer for me!! Easy to use. This mop is the best for me as I am disabled and struggle with other mops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprise! This thing actually works pretty well
reviews.reviewText: I am not a clean freak for sure. But, in the division of labor in my households, floor cleaning often falls to me. I treated myself to this Swiffer thing because it was on sale. I don't smell it but my spouse dislikes the scent. You can refill the dispenser with any strong no-rinse required floor cleaner. It is handy to use and the scrubber is effective. The pads can be washed and re-used though Swiffer really would prefer you buy new ones.All said and done, the Swiffer power mop thing is a time saver that does a decent job with a minimum of fuss.By the way, Krud Cutter concentrated power cleaner is expensive but it will clean a vinyl floor that has been abused and abandoned. Worth a try when all else has failed but not for the feint of heart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Swiffer mop is a convenient and effective cleaning tool. Its disposable pads make quick work of dust and dirt, but ongoing costs can add up. The lightweight design and easy assembly are definite pluses for hassle-free cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: MUCH better than the green swiffer. Super easy to assemble and comes with everything you need to get started. I love the fresh smell. However I would highly recommend the reusable pads from Amazon as the ones it comes with get dirty and break apart easily, and are also pricey!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a game changer!
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy this upgraded Swiffer Mop System since I already have the older version. But I was curious, so I went ahead and purchased it. Well, I am SO glad that I did! With the older mop, I would use about 5 pads to do all my floors. And my back would be hurting by the time I was finished. With the new mop, I can get through all my floors on must 1 pad! The upgraded pads can pick up so much more dirt. The mop head is so much bigger than the older model, so I get finished a LOT quicker - so no aching back. The unit weighs a lot less than the older one. The bottle of cleaning solution is smaller than the older version so I was concerned that I would go through it too quickly, but it sprays a fine mist, and it lasts long! I no longer dread mopping - I am so glad that I bought this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought it because my mom need something that’s easy to use. Cleans great. Have reusable mop refills. Doesn’t hurt my mom back or knees. Cleans great. Better than the swifter mop and the swifter wet jet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received my new Power Mop about 3/4 hour ago. Opening the box by the strip was impossible so I opened it from the top, easy. The lower handle did not fit into the slots on the handle. The upper handle did fit into the slots. The swivel handle does not stay in place when you try to mop the floor, it turns every which way making for a problem trying to mop in a straight line. I managed to do my kitchen floor but noticed a few streaks which I went over a second time.I prefer my bucket mop system to do the floors even though it takes longer. The Power Mop is o k for little spills or to do a quick once over. The pads are not washable, so it is expensive to wash the floor and have to throw the pads away afterwards. After I have done the bathroom floors, I will try to wash the pad in a bowl and see if it stands up for another cleaning. I have mixed feeling about the Swiffer Power Mop as it does not do a better job than a bucket mop. It seemed to clean the grout as well as the bucket mop.The odor from the liquid is quite strong and I can smell it in other parts of the house, it should go away by tomorrow. I give it a 6 out of 10.

The media could not be loaded. It is such a good mop! The button control at the top of the handle is super easy to use and press to spray out as much cleaning liquid as you want and the cleaning solution pops in super easy and smells great too. It smells a bit like windex but less strong and more lavender. The 360 swivel also makes it super easy for it to turn around corners, objects and furniture on its own! It really gets up in the edges! My only complaint is that the mop pads are a weird velcro fit, it doesn't stay on the mop all the way but also doesn't fall off or come off at all when mopping? The mop pads are also not enough, you only get two and you use the first one which leaves you with just one left, and it can get pricey buying the refills. My tip for you is just purchase reusable washable ones. It will save you TONS of money considering that the brand Swiffer itself is kind of expensive. Also just to let you know, I mopped my whole downstairs floor and went over a couple of spots and rooms and about half of the solution is gone. I think the amount you get is not too bad neither good, it is just enough to do the job. Though it can also be pricey to repurchase the refills.. and it also says in the instructions manual to not make your own solution. Interesting. By the way I'm not sure why people in the reviews said the handle was too short.. im about 5ft and it is great for me and everyone else. It is pretty tall. It's only short if you're about 8.5ft.. so i'm not sure about that. The scrubbers are also average, not like they displayed as "powerful scrubbers." They're pretty mid honestly. The weight is also okay.. overtime I can see how it can be heavy and I'm young. Might be kind of heavy for mopping for long periods of time, especially if you are of older age. ALSO.. the pads DO trap dust, hair and pet fur really well!!! Overall a great mop though!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product, can't go wrong with it.
reviews.reviewText: Honestly this does what it needs to, my product came brand new the only issue i had was the box was open for some reason.Easy to assemble, takes 10 seconds. Came with everything listed in description. Super easy to clean with, the cleaning solution smells incredible honestly! Everyone in my family loves the smell, i will definitely be buying the original scent again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great improvement over the original mop.
reviews.reviewText: I still use and love my steam mop for thorough cleaning but this one is handy for quick cleanup. We have tile on main floor and two dogs so you can imagine the need for constant cleaning.The replacement pads last through several cleanings and do not need to be replaced each time you use the mop. The fresh scent is pleasant and clean smelling. Cheaper than anywhere else too. Keep an eye on Amazon deals.

reviews.reviewTitle: Effortless Cleaning, Easy to Use, Easy to Store, Fresh Floors Every Time
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to the Swiffer PowerMop and it has made cleaning my floor way faster than my mop and spin kit. (My swiffer is actually resting on my mop and bucket system in the entryway closet - as seen in the image). This kit is a game-changer for anyone seeking efficiency, convenience, and a lasting freshness in their living spaces.The standout feature of the Swiffer PowerMop is its remarkable ease of use. The power button activates a cleaning solution spray, eliminating the need for a separate mop bucket. This not only streamlines the cleaning process but also ensures that every swipe leaves behind a burst of fresh scent.The dual-textured pads are highly effective in trapping and locking away dirt, dust, and grime, providing a thorough clean on various surfaces. The flexibility of the mop head allows it to reach into corners and tight spaces effortlessly, leaving no area untouched. The disposable pads are convenient, eliminating the hassle of washing and maintaining reusable mop heads.The fresh scent left behind after each cleaning session is a delightful bonus. It transforms my home, creating a welcoming atmosphere that lingers long after the cleaning is done. Although I can see some people not liking the smell as it is on the stronger side. If you have guests over that are sensitive to smells, maybe clean a little earlier. The smell lasts about 4-6 hours I'd say depending on the ventilation in your home.In conclusion, the Swiffer PowerMop is a must-have for busy households or anyone looking to simplify their cleaning routine. It is not costly, combines convenience, efficiency, and a fresh scent, making floor cleaning a breeze. I highly recommend this kit for those who want immaculate floors with minimal effort.
